edu.usm.cos420.example1.service.impl

Class Example1Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.usm.cos420.example1.service.impl.Example1Service
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExampleService

    public class Example1Service
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExampleService
    The Example1 Service Layer Implementation is based a design pattern which aims to organize the functionality of the application into logical units that are typically layered on top of much of the low level functionality of the application. This organization helps support service oriented architectures.
